vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μηδᾰμ-ῶς,
adverb of μηδαμός, ={μηδαμῇ}, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: in replies, as a strong negative, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: surely not, by no means, certainly not
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
surely not, by no means, certainly not
by no means, surely not Acts 10:14; 11:8*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không hề; chẳng bao giờ; không bao giờ; chưa hề
